nodes.text: Woolamanders were a species of creature native to the moon Yavin 4. They lived in the canopy level of the gigantic Massassi trees native to the world where they cradled their young, and late at night produced echoing mating calls. Woolamanders had rotund bellies, a pair of arms that were much longer than their legs, and a thin tail capped with a bushy tuft of rainbow-colored hair. Their bodies were mostly covered in blue fur with occasional patches of red and yellow. Kes Dameron was capable of tracking woolamanders by scent.

Woolamanders were first mentioned in Dark Apprentice, a Star Wars Legends novel written by Kevin J. Anderson and released in 1994. The species was confirmed to be canon in the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
